description:
**Fix Overview**:

Recent reports indicate that Tesla has recalled all iterations of the holiday update (versions 2023.44.30.1 through 2023.44.30.4) due to multiple issues identified by vehicle owners. As a resolution, Tesla will roll out a corrective update which includes numerous bug fixes aimed at addressing the problems encountered with the previous versions.

1. Ensure that your Tesla vehicle's software is connected to Wi-Fi.
2. Wait for the new update notification which will arrive within the next week.
3. Follow the on-screen instructions to download and install the update once available.

**Details**:
- This update is intended to enhance vehicle functionality by resolving reported problems.
- Regularly check your vehicle’s software status to make sure you receive updates promptly.
